description.p: You've put in the effort to expand your magical abilites in the following ways:
Two's Company. You now can Inspire two people at once with Bardic Inspiration. It still requires one use of Bardic Inspiration per target.
An Inspiration to us All. You gain an additional Bardic Inspiration Charge
Heroic Inspiration. Your Bardic Inspiration now imparts the Heroism spell onto the targets.

sheet.description: You can Bardically Inspire two allies with one bonus action. Your Bardic Inspiration now imparts the Heroism spell onto the targets.

description.p: You've put in the effort to expand your magical abilites in the following ways:
Three's a Crowd. You now can Inspire three people at once with Bardic Inspiration. It still requires one use of Bardic Inspiration per target.
An Inspiration to us All. You gain an additional Bardic Inspiration Charge
Caffeinated Inspiration. Your Bardic Inspiration now imparts the Haste spell onto the targets.

sheet.description: You can Bardically Inspire three allies with one bonus action. Your Bardic Inspiration now imparts the Haste spell onto the targets.

description.p: You've put in the effort to expand your magical abilites in the following ways:

An Inspiration to us All. You gain an additional Bardic Inspiration Charge
Caffeinated Inspiration. Your Bardic Inspiration now heals as if you cast the Mass Cure Wounds spell onto the targets.

sheet.description: You can Bardically Inspire three allies with one bonus action. Your Bardic Inspiration now heals as if you cast the Mass Cure Wounds spell onto the targets.

description.p: You've put in the effort to expand your magical abilites in the following ways:
YOU GOT THE TOUCH! You now can Inspire yourself.
An Inspiration to us All. You gain an additional Bardic Inspiration Charge
I AM THE HYPE. You can bardically inspire someone after an Action that deals damage.
